description:
Middle school students fought fiercely against one another in a national tournament. Now, 50 chosen representatives return to fight again as high school students!

The stage is the U-17 (Under Seventeen) Japanese Representative Training Camp. Middle school students have been invited for the first time to a camp known to produce the best Japanese tennis players. National champions from Seigaku, Hyotei, Rikkai, Shitenhoji... With all the rivals from the national tournament attending, everyone eagerly awaits their reunion.

At first, the middle schoolers do not expect much from their high school opponents. However, the training camp is not so easy! Athletes with skills incomparable to those they previously faced and their mysterious coach appear before them. Faced with numerous demanding challenges, can the middle schoolers survive in this meritocratic training camp?

(Source: Crunchyroll)

**Height:** 180 cm

**Hobbies:** Going to the gym, taking care of his health, playing Mario Party 3

Started off as a production manager at Ad Cosmo.

Freelancer with deep ties to [Production I.G](https://anilist.co/studio/10/).

__Cher Watanabe__ is a Japanese musician, composer, arranger and keyboardist.

[Instagram](https://Instagram.com/mikemorais10/)

Michael Morais Rodrígues, better known as Mike Morais, is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, dubbing director, audio engineer, record producer and singer.

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/lucianomonteirosoares/)

Luciano Monteiro Soares is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, singer and dubbing director. He is also the older brother of voice actor [Pedro Soares](https://anilist.co/staff/244222/).

__Non-Anime Roles:__
~!- Finn Mertens, the Human (Adventure Time)
- Freddie Benson (iCarly)
- Zack Martin and Cody Martin (Zack & Cody)
- Baljeet Tjinder (Phineas and Ferb)
- Spidermonkey (Ben 10 franchise)
- Adam Lyon (My Gym Partner's a Monkey)
- Kevin Whitney (Krypto the Superdog)
- Lewis Robinson (Meet the Robinsons)
- Firestorm (Justice League Action)
!~

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/BamFdz)

Iván Jair Fernández Isidoro is a Mexican voice actor.

[Website](https://www.fujisawanorimasa.net/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/fujisawa_0308) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/c/fujisawanorimasa)

Norimasa Fujisawa (藤澤 ノリマサ, born March 8, 1983 in Sapporo, Hokkaido) is a Japanese singer.
